sentences.en: A preliminary study of a shoal often flesh-and-blood sticklebacks shows that they do indeed mingle with therobot and that they follow its leadership cues as predicted.
sentences.cn: 对一个有十条真实刺鱼鱼群的初步研究显示，他们确实接纳了那条机器鱼，并且接受它的领导指示。

sentences.en: A shoal of fish will do this.
A shoal of porpoises are on the feed.
sentences.cn: 一群海豚正在吞吃食物.

sentences.en: A shoal of porpoises are well on the feed.
Among them swam shoals of fish.
sentences.cn: 在他们之中游动着一群群鱼儿。

sentences.en: Debris flow waste - shoal, and abundant resource and, is a kind of land resource in Jiangjia gully.
sentences.cn: 蒋家沟泥石流滩地地势平坦,水源充足,热量丰富, 是较好的土地资源.

sentences.en: FEW minutes later Tom was shoal water of the bar.
sentences.cn: 几分钟之后,汤姆便到了沙洲的浅水滩上.

sentences.en: He was transferred to Shoal Creek Mental Institution for an indefinite period.
sentences.cn: 他被转到了肖尔溪精神病院，要在那里无限期地呆下去。

sentences.en: How can I tell the abyssal zone from the shoal waters?
sentences.cn: 我怎么区分深水区和浅水区 呀 ?

sentences.en: In the shoal water, we could see shoals of tiny fish darting about.
sentences.cn: 在浅水区, 我们看到一群小鱼在游来游去.

sentences.en: Kongling Shoal and Shadow - Play Gorge.
Mom: Look out, honey. Let's come to the shoal waters . Follow me!
sentences.cn: 妈妈: 当心点, 孩子. 我们去浅水区吧,跟我来.

sentences.en: The boat struck a shoal and fetched up all standing.
sentences.cn: 那艘船撞上浅滩突然停了下来。

sentences.en: The ship struck a shoal all standing.
sentences.cn: 那艘船撞上浅滩突然停了下来.

sentences.en: The ship struck a shoal and brought up all standing.
sentences.cn: 那艘船撞上了浅滩突然停住.

sentences.en: The shoal ( or bank ) and shoal facies are important types of carbonate deposits.
sentences.cn: 滩或滩相是碳酸盐沈积中的重要类型,常见的有生物碎屑滩和鲕粒滩.

sentences.en: We need to port the boat to get around the shoal.
sentences.cn: 我们得左转舵以绕过浅滩.

trans.tran_cn: 浅滩，沙洲，潜在的危险，鱼群，大量
trans.tran_en: a large group of fish swimming together
